sourcesContent:
<template>
  <JobPosition
    v-for="position in positions"
    v-bind:key="position.sys.id"
    v-bind:company="position.company"
    v-bind:title="position.title"
    v-bind:description="position.description2"
    v-bind:startDate="position.startDate"
    v-bind:endDate="position.endDate"
  />
</template>

<script>
import JobPosition from "./position.vue";

export default {
  
  name: "JobPositions",
  components: { JobPosition },
  props: {
    company: String,
    title: String,
    startDate: String,
    endDate: String,
    position: String,
    description: String
  },
  created: function () {
    this.moment = moment;
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
p {
  white-space: pre-line;  
}
.job {
  display: grid; 
  grid-template-columns: 1fr 2fr; 
  grid-template-rows: 1fr; 
  grid-column-gap: 3rem;
  grid-row-gap: 0px;
  color: #232830;
}

h4, .date {
  font-size: 16px;
  margin: 0;
  padding: 0;
  line-height: 1.5rem;
  }

.date {
  color: #666666;
}

h2 {
  font-size: 1.953rem;
  font-weight: 400;
  margin: 0;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}

.description {
  font-size: 1.25rem;
  line-height: 1.5em;
}
/* .date { grid-area: 1 / 1 / 2 / 2; }  */
/* .details { grid-area: 1 / 2 / 2 / 6; }  */
</style>
